thread.section_title: the Quin - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: EXCELLENT
thread.title_full: EXCELLENT - Review of the Quin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: lni2017
title: EXCELLENT
text: Great hotel with a cool vive, excellent location, with the F train just a few steps out, and the R a block away, being a runner I enjoyed having central park a couple of blocks away. Really friendly staff from the moment you arrive until the day you leave, the rooms are really comfortable and clean, nice amenities, NESPRESSO machine for your morninig coffee. definitely will stay here again!!!
